entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:43 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -38.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanirajak (Hall Beach Airport) 6:00 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -38.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -52
Dewpoint: -42.0°C
Wind: NNW 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 40 km/h. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 56 this evening and minus 61 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023
